reuze.awt

Class ib_FilterErode

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.software.reuze.ib_a_Ops
      • com.software.reuze.ib_a_FilterWholeImage
        • com.software.reuze.ib_a_FilterBinary
          • reuze.awt.ib_FilterErode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    z_BufferedImageOp, Serializable

    public class ib_FilterErode
extends ib_a_FilterBinary
    Given a binary image, this filter performs binary erosion, setting all removed pixels to the given 'new' color.
    See Also:
